ProjectTitle: How does the mosquito microbiota (virome and bacteriome) influence the ability of Culex mosquitoes to transmit West Nile Virus and Usutu Virus, two important emerging flaviviruses in Europe?
InitialFeedbackHistory: 01/03/2023 [REDACTED] Please also include the samples that you will use (physical data), are you collecting mosquito's or will you use collections that are already available at KU [REDACTED] [REDACTED] project zal gebruik maken van 'field-collected mosquitoes from different regions worldwide'. [REDACTED] er reeds bekeken of dit onderzoek onder het [REDACTED] [REDACTED] valt? [REDACTED] indien de EU wetgeving niet van toepassing is, is er mogelijks lokale ABS wetgeving die de toegang tot de muggen reguleert. [REDACTED] meer info omtrent het [REDACTED] [REDACTED] zie https://research.kuleuven.be/en/associatienet/ethics/guidance/nagoya. [REDACTED] kan ook steeds contact opnemen met [REDACTED] [REDACTED] (wouter.vandevelde@kuleuven.be). [REDACTED] please note that KU [REDACTED] now also has a repository (RDR https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr) that you can use for data sharing as alternative for [REDACTED] (for sequencing data it is better to use NCBI (or EBI) as you describe).
